description:
On the surface, Tommy Pistol’s life is perfect. He has a beautiful wife (Casey Calvert) and a nice house full of expensive things. But the reality is different matter. Casey is a materialistic shrew who only cares about herself, compulsive shopping and the image she portrays to the outside world. In the real world she dominates Tommy emotionally, grinding him into a pathetic shell of a man with a huge credit card debt. But in Tommy’s fantasy, he’s the one in charge.
She’s bound to a cross in their living room as he berates her about her obsession with possessions and being a selfish bitch. He rips her bra open and slaps her tits and belly. Kissing her roughly he informs her that tonight is his night to do what HE wants! He shows her one of HIS possessions, a heavy leather flogger that he uses on her breasts and abs. He fingers her cunt before whipping that too. She tells him how sorry she is for treating him so bad, but he’s past that point. He doesn’t want her words, he wants his revenge, and he gets it with a riding crop to her tits and pussy! A scene from the AVN nominated film, “Kinky Fantasy Club.” (Part 1 of 3)
title: Tommy's Revenge (Part 1 of 3)
